page.title: 13A DAY IN MY LIFE pt1
page.content: In the morning when I get up I go downstairs for breakfast and a drink of tea.When I Have finished I go upstairs again to get dressed and to clesn my teeth and brush my hair.At half past eight I get my coat and shoes on.Sometimes I walk to school and sometimes I go in the car.When I Get to school I go out to play.At nine o'clock school starts and we go into assembly.On Thursday we do sinfing practice with Mrs.Pemberton, after assembly we do maths until half past ten then we go out to play.When we come in we do something like Effective Englsh and we do this until twelve o'clock which is dinner time.I am on second sitting so I go out to play but first sitting go up for dinner.When the buzzer goes we get ready for dinner and go up to the canteen.We wait outside until first sitting(cont)
